original_text: This is how they make their idols: A man who works with iron takes his tool. He makes the metal hot in the fire. Then he uses hammers to hit it with his strong arms. He hits it so that it has the right shape. But then he becomes hungry. He is too weak to work any more. He does not drink any water and so he feels tired. This is how they make their idols: A man who works with iron takes his tool. He makes the metal hot in the fire. Then he uses hammers to hit it with his strong arms. He hits it so that it has the right shape. But then he becomes hungry. He is too weak to work any more. He does not drink any water and so he feels tired. This is how they make their idols:
korean_text: 철공은 철로 연장을 만들고 숯불로 일하며 망치를 가지고 그것을 만들며 그의 힘센 팔로 그 일을 하나 배가 고프면 기운이 없고 물을 마시지 아니하면 피로하니라

sentences.original_text: This is how they make their idols:
A man who works with iron takes his tool.
sentences.korean_translation: 철을 다루는 사람이 그의 도구를 가져옵니다.

sentences.original_text: He makes the metal hot in the fire.
Then he uses hammers to hit it
sentences.korean_translation: 그런 다음 그는 망치로 그것을 칩니다

sentences.original_text: with his strong arms.
He hits it so that it has the right shape.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 올바른 모양이 되도록 그것을 칩니다.

sentences.original_text: But then he becomes hungry.
He is too weak to work any more.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 더 이상 일할 수 없을 만큼 약해집니다.

sentences.original_text: He does not drink any water
and so he feels tired.
This is how they make their idols:
A man who works with iron takes his tool.
sentences.korean_translation: 철을 다루는 사람이 그의 도구를 가져옵니다.

Then he uses hammers to hit it

sentences.original_text: with his strong arms.
He hits it so that it has the right shape.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 올바른 모양이 되도록 그것을 칩니다.

sentences.original_text: But then he becomes hungry.
He is too weak to work any more.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 더 이상 일할 수 없을 만큼 약해집니다.

and so he feels tired.
